descriptionHtml:
Hello

This is my first Upload on this Page.
I'm from Germany and my English is very bad, so Sry Ok?

This is my personal Character Preset of my Beautiful Girl Ghoszt.
Only for RaceMenu.
I hope you like this Preset and have a lot of Fun with it.



[size=4][u][center][/center][center][img]http://fs1.directupload.net/images/150226/m7ysiuss.png[/img][/center]
[/u][/size]To install this Preset go to: Skyrim/Data/SKSE/Plugins/CharGen/Presets and copy my Preset in this Folder.
Launch Skyrim with SKSE and open the RaceMenu with the Console. (Console Command: showracemenu)
Go to Presets press F9 and load my Preset.
READY

RACE: DARK ELF
WEIGHT: 100%

Scroll down for the Required and Recommend Mods!!

[img]http://fs1.directupload.net/images/150222/xcezqkrn.jpg[/img]
Screenshot by Ghosztmind--

[img]http://fs2.directupload.net/images/150222/6834ztx3.jpg[/img]
Screenshot by Ghosztmind--

[color=#cc0000][b]REQUIRED MODS:

[/b][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?]Enhanced Character Edit[/url]
KS Hairdos (Its Removed from Nexus,Â you have to find it yourself)
